ticket.title: validates_numericality_of doesn't honor :allow_nil option (but does :allow_blank)
ticket.original-body:
In the [documentation for the validates_numericality_of validation method](http://ar.rubyonrails.org/classes/ActiveRecord/Validations/ClassMethods.html#M000091), it lists a :allow_nil option. In my Rails 3.0.5 app my model will still not validate if this is set to true.
I tried it with :allow_blank => true and this seems to work. Perhaps the documentation should be updated to reflect this. (I can submit an update but I'm not sure how to do this)
